text:
I have discover in my lessons of information-communication the author : Alex Dupont. Alex Dupont is a sociologist who make a convention "Sur la télévision". This convention was very interesting and I decide to talk about this today. He learned that the journalist influenced and are influenced by the fast boss. The information transmitted are very controlled by differents way. Indeed, journalists can choose informations that they transmit at peoples. The boss which are from different politics party can have an influence. Journalists have also more and more competition between us. So, they go in the way to their boss in order to keep their job. The competition make the self-censorship faster. The information are selected and self-censored, so, we are manipulated. That is the Alex Dupont's remarks.
 He speaks also about the fast-thinking in us society. Peoples think with stereotypes and uses that can help to thougt more quikly. So, the peoples don't reflect with their heads but with stereotypes. Journalists dictate at peoples that their do thinking. In the urgence we can't think.
 He puts in the front the fact that for manipulate we can use 2 emotions. This emotions are afraid and compassion. That's for this reasons that journalists use chock pictures and words.
The scoop are reserched indefinitely by journalists in order to make audience. The audience are also a fact that journalists take to make informations. The law of audience imprisone journalists because they do more and more audience to survive ans rest at their jobs. So, the minor news item are put in the front to make audience. They transformed a minor item on a big fact for that the people were chocked about him.
  Today, there are a lot of tv channels so, journalists have to dicount.  Finally, I have learned lot of things grace at Alex Dupont. So, I can have a criticism opinion about the television and his constituents.
